articles.title: Malaysian man confirmed as Singapore's first local monkeypox case - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The Ministry of Health (MOH) has confirmed the first local case of monkeypox infection in Singapore.
